'''v0.12.1 alpha build 7''' is the seventh build released for [[Pocket Edition v0.12.1 alpha|v0.12.1]].

== Changes ==

*[[Ghast]]s now drop [[gunpowder]] and [[ghast tear]]s.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=0.12.1 Beta 7|otherissuescount=6
|;From the 0.12.1 development versions
|MCPE-9338|Ghasts don't drop ghast tears.
|MCPE-9372|Enchanment Table not working on multiplayer.
|MCPE-9442|Skin selection screen
|MCPE-9753|Iron golem does not drop iron and roses.
|MCPE-10188|Squid do not drop ink sacs.
}}
'''Other'''
*Input now runs at 60 fps instead of 20.
*Placing [[block]]s on [[Snow|snow layers]] now replaces the snow rather than placing the block next to it.
*The [[player]] can now use the [[chat]] while in [[bed]].
*[[Monster spawner]]s are now synchronized online.
*Multiple connected [[door]]s now work correctly.
*Fixed custom names having formatting on [[anvil]]s.</onlyinclude>
